server.model

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.model.Entity

  • public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    The class Entity() is a class that defines an Object, Player, NPC. the NPC & Player current extend to this abstraction.
    Author:
    Dennis

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Entity.AttackStyles
      Represents the attack styles in which the entity performs inside and outside of combat.

      abstract void dealDamage()
      Deals damage to the entity type (Player, Object, NPC).
      UpdateFlags getUpdateFlags()
      Gets the UpdateFlags and returns flags.
      abstract int getX()
      Gets the entities tile based X coordinate.
      abstract int getY()
      Gets the entities tile based Y coordinate.
      abstract void giveLife()
      After the entity dies, the new life of the entity is put inside this function.
      abstract void initialize()
      Initializing the entity to the game server.
      abstract void onDeath()
      On death of the entity initiate this function.
      abstract void process()
      Processes all functions that the entity performs in, as well as events, etc..
      abstract boolean processQueuedPackets()
      The entity processes all inbound and outbound packets.
      abstract void update()
      Updates the entity to the game server.
